channel.title: NPC Drops
channel.description:
Hey, I've been having trouble with my NPC drops (I already searched for the info on help, and couldn't find the exact info I wanted). The drop code I'm working on (my first one) is: npcdrop = 1 0 526 1 0995 10 0995 15
I know that the 0 causes a 100% drop; by researching on the forums, I found that if I change the 0 to a number 1-5, it will "randomly pick" the item, but when I change the 0 to another amount, it only spawns bones (item 526), or dwarf remains (which is not a number listed).
Basically, when I use '0' for the droptype it works and drops all items, but when I use any other number for the droptype, it drops bones and/or dwarf remains.
How can I edit this so it will randomly drop on the three items?

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @akgamer0615 akgamer0615
item.description:
@akgamer0615 wrote:

Hey, I’ve been having trouble with my NPC drops (I already searched for the info on help, and couldn’t find the exact info I wanted).
The drop code I’m working on (my first one) is:
npcdrop = 1 0 526 1 0995 10 0995 15

I know that the 0 causes a 100% drop; by researching on the forums, I found that if I change the 0 to a number 1-5, it will “randomly pick” the item, but when I change the 0 to another amount, it only spawns bones (item 526), or dwarf remains (which is not a number listed).

Basically, when I use ‘0’ for the droptype it works and drops all items, but when I use any other number for the droptype, it drops bones and/or dwarf remains.

How can I edit this so it will randomly drop on the three items?

Read full topic
